5.75. 
Inheritance of land
If land is inherited by an heir who, according to the laws of the Republic of Lithuania, cannot have a right of ownership over the land, he shall be entitled only to the amount of money received from the sale of the inherited land. The land shall be sold, on the basis of a certificate of inheritance submitted by the heir, either to a buyer designated by the heir or at an auction in accordance with the procedure laid down by the Government. The amount received shall be paid to the heir after deducting the costs of organising the sale or auction.
